rukus.text: nuna; kalamara sapata arau sihamte yi likhe tara sapata
tomara pratipalakara anugraha ye, tumi unmada nahaya
Arau niscaya tomara babe ache nirabicchinna puraskara
Arau niscaya tumi mahana caraitrara ucca srngata adhisthita
Eteke anatipalame tumi dekhibalai paba arau sihamte'o dekhibalai paba
tomalokara majata kona bikaragrastha
niscaya tomara pratipalaka samyaka aragata sihamtara bisaye yihamte te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche, arau te'om hidayata praaptasakalara bisaye'o samyaka paraijnata
Gatike tumi mithyaraopakaraisakalara anugatya nakaraiba
Sihamte kamana karae ye, tumi aposakami horaa, tente sihamte'o aposakami ha'ba
Arau tumi anugatya nakaraiba pratyeka ene byaktira yiye adhika sapatakarai, lanchita
pithira amrata nindakarai arau yijana cogalakhurai karai phurae
Kalyanara kamata badha pradanakarai, simalanghanakarai, papistha
dusta prakrtira, taduparai kukhyata
e'i babe'i ye, si achila dhana-sampada arau santana-santatira adhikarai
Yetiya tara ocarata amara ayatasamuha tilaraata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, e'ibora purbarartisakalara kalpa-kahini matra
Ati sighrae ami tara surata (nakata) daga dima
Niscaya ami ihamtaka paraiksa karaicho, yenekai paraiksa karaichilo udyana-adhipatisakalaka, yetiya sihamte sapata karaichila ye, arasye raatipuraa'i sihamte baganara phala aharana karaiba
Arau sihamte ‘ina sba allaha’ koraa nachila
Seye tomara pratipalakara ocarara paraa eta pradaksinakarai (biparyaya, ju'i) baganara oparata pradaksina karaile, se'i samayata sihamta achila topanita
Phalata i (ju'i lagi) kalabarnara nicina hai ga’la
Raatipuraa'i sihamte ijane sijanaka mati ka’le
‘yadi tomaloke phala aharana karaiba bicaraa teneha’le purati nisa'i tomalokara baganalai yoraa’
Tara pichata sihamte yabalai dharaile, arau nimnasbarae e'i katha kai achila
ye ‘aji tata tomalokara ocarata yate kono dukhiya-abharai praraesa karaiba noraarae’
Arau sihamte purati nisa'i drrha iccha sakti lai saksama arasthata (baganalai) yatraa karaile
Tara pichata sihamte yetiya baganakhana dekhibalai pale, tetiya sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya patha herauraa'icho’
‘Baram ami bancita’
Sihamtara majara sraestha byaktijane ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka koraa nachilone ye, tomaloke kiya allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana nakaraa’
sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara pratipalakara paraitrata ghosana karaom. Niscaya ami yalima achilo’
Tara pichata sihamte ijane sijanaka dosaraopa karaibalai dharaile
Sihamte ka’le, ‘haya, amara dhbansa! Niscaya ami simalanghanakarai achilo’
Sambharatah amara pratipalake amaka iyatakaiyo utkrsta binimaya pradana karaiba. Arasye ami amara pratipalakara prati agrahi
E'idarae'i haya sasti arau akhiraatara sasti arau danara, yadi sihamte janilehemtena
